challenges.title: Minimum Wage Issue
challenges.description: The current minimum wage in Jordan, 260 JOD per month, is often insufficient to cover the cost of living, especially in urban areas like Amman.

challenges.title: Lack of Luxury Spaces
challenges.description: Life has become just work to meet basic needs, with a lack of luxury spaces for relaxation and leisure.

challenges.title: Affordable Solutions
challenges.description: Solutions are needed to provide basic needs at affordable prices.

content.discription: In actus go we aim to become the user daily habit while what only matter is saving so we add a lot of fun for this process to become more valuable for you.
